item.title: Traffic Collision and Avoidance System (TCAS) Resolution Advisory (RA) Display System(s) – RA Inoperative TA Operative

numlitem.para: Traffic Alert (TA) visual display and audio functions are operative,
TA only mode is selected by the crew, and
En route or approach procedures do not require its use.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Operate TCAS in TA-Only mode by selecting TCAS Mode Selector to TA ONLY position.

placard.para: Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel: "____RESOLUTION ADV SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
